Sentencas: Lanthanum silicate oxy-apatites are thought of as ytrria-stabilized zirconia substitutes in intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Molten-salt synthesis of oxyapatite La9.33Si6O26 powders as electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Lanthanum silicate oxy-apatite powders La9.33Si6O26 are successfully synthesized at lower temperature by a molten-salt method.
Titulo: Molten-salt synthesis of oxyapatite La9.33Si6O26 powders as electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction, scanning electron microscopy, and precision impedance analysis used to characterize the structure, appearance, and conductivity of La9.33Si6O26.
Titulo: Molten-salt synthesis of oxyapatite La9.33Si6O26 powders as electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results indicate that the apatite phase has been synthesized.
Titulo: Molten-salt synthesis of oxyapatite La9.33Si6O26 powders as electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The synthesis method decreases the synthesis temperature by about 300 degrees C in comparison to the conventional solid-state reaction route and obtains homogeneous and nano-size powders.
Titulo: Molten-salt synthesis of oxyapatite La9.33Si6O26 powders as electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Dense ceramics have been prepared at sintering temperatures around 1450 degrees C.
Titulo: Molten-salt synthesis of oxyapatite La9.33Si6O26 powders as electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The used of molten-salt powders allows a decrease of the dense ceramic pellet sintering temperature of about 200 degrees C.
Titulo: Molten-salt synthesis of oxyapatite La9.33Si6O26 powders as electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The ceramic pellets sintering at 1550 degrees C for 4 h have a relative density of 92% and an electrical conductivity of 1.1 x 10(-3) S cm(-1) at 700 degrees C, higher than the some reported for the solid-state synthesis method and the sol-gel method.
Titulo: Molten-salt synthesis of oxyapatite La9.33Si6O26 powders as electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Titulo: Molten-salt synthesis of oxyapatite La9.33Si6O26 powders as electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
